heading: PTR 2.2.0 Known Issues
content: The 2.2 PTR is up for a few hours and the known issues list has been released! Check it out! As you know Season of Witchcraft has been here for some time already and Season 8 is already well on its way with the 2.2 PTR live now. We hope you enjoy the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus is now on the 2.2 PTR and grab as much knowledge we can for Season 8 for our If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
